channel.title: CVE Feed for weatheratlas -- Weather Atlas Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for weatheratlas -- Weather Atlas Widget

item.title: CVE-2023-5163|2023-11-22T15:33:34.005Z -- weatheratlas -- weather%20atlas%20widget
item.description: The Weather Atlas Widget plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'shortcode-weather-atlas' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 1.2.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
